video.title: VeggieTales in the House
video.synopsis: The exciting new adventures of Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber, and all their Veggie friends as you've never seen them before: in the house!

episodes.synopsis: Larry and Laura Carrot want to adopt puppies of their own. The Veggies try to hide from their troubles and each other in Pa Grape’s store.
episodes.title: Puppies & Guppies / Sorry We're Closed Today

episodes.synopsis: Bob thinks having a mustache will change everything. Bob and Larry learn what it means to not go to bed angry.
episodes.title: Bob & The Awesome Frosting Mustache / Bob and Larry: Gettin' Angry

episodes.synopsis: Larry’s bad habits make it hard for Bob to do his new job. Bob and Jimmy want new roommates so they decide to swap and get surprising results.
episodes.title: Bob's Bad Breath / Trading Places

episodes.synopsis: Bob and Larry hatch a scheme to buy a monster truck. Pa Grape warns a freezing cold Petunia not to turn up the heat in his store.
episodes.title: Jimmy & Jerry Are Rich / Feelin Hot, Hot, Hot

episodes.synopsis: Laura thinks she only has to dream she’s a great athlete to be a great athlete. It’s sour grapes for Madame Blueberry when she loses a baking contest.
episodes.title: Laura at Bat / Pie Fight!

episodes.synopsis: Pa Grape adopts Jean Claude so they can compete in the Father-Son Day Celebration games; Larry convinces Petunia to let him take care of her plants.
episodes.title: Pa Grape's Son / Larry's Cardboard Thumb

episodes.synopsis: Bob tries to get his name on the new generosity shelter; Larry and the veggies ignore warnings not to open the air-conditioning vent.
episodes.title: The Gong Heard Round the House / When Dust Bunnies Come to Town

episodes.synopsis: Bob and Larry take Ichabeezer on an adventure, doing things they think he wants to do; Pa Grape asks Madame Blueberry to sing a jingle for his store.
episodes.title: The Bucket List / A Gift for Singing

episodes.synopsis: Larry opens a lemonade stand to raise money -- so he can buy a video game; Junior Asparagus recruits Laura Carrot and Larry to help him build a fort.
episodes.title: Lie-Monade / Let's Build a Fort

episodes.synopsis: Pa Grape asks Larry to let the silly new guy help drive the ice-cream cart; LarryBoy is reluctant to save grumpy Ichabeezer from the nefarious Motato.
episodes.title: Bacon & Ice Cream / For the Honor of LarryBoy

episodes.synopsis: Motato is stealing birthdays with his evil De-Birthday-Ficator; Junior befriends a young "buffalorange," but Ichabeezer wants to capture the animal.
episodes.title: The Birthday Thief / Junior Gets a Pet

episodes.synopsis: Larry gets sunglasses -- and an attitude -- after Jimmy and Jerry Gourd say he's not cool; Larry figures out how to get every comic book ever made.
episodes.title: Cool as a Cucumber / The Rich Young Comic Ruler

episodes.synopsis: Bob, Larry and Madame Blueberry accidentally flood the kitchen with burned popcorn; Motato captures Ichabeezer's beloved dog, Rooney.
episodes.title: Popcorntastrophe / Junior Jetpack

episodes.synopsis: Motato creates a radish super-soldier to hunt down LarryBoy; Junior and his friend Tiny Pea risk danger by sailing in the koi pond all by themselves.
episodes.title: Monster Manners / You, Me, & Tiny Pea

episodes.synopsis: Motato kidnaps pop star Jenna Chive when she visits the Veggie House; Larry finds the perfect toy pirate ship -- just as Ichabeezer loses his.
episodes.title: Jenna Chive Live / Captain LarryBeard

episodes.synopsis: Larry tries to help when Bob's tonsils are removed; Jimmy and Jerry don't know what to feed their pet guppy, so they turn to Laura Carrot for advice.
episodes.title: The Great Ice Cream Chase / The Guppy Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: When Mayor Archibald asks Bob to write a speech, Larry zaps him with a silly ray; Bob wants to keep all the S’mores for himself on a camping trip.
episodes.title: The Silly Ray / The Camp Out

episodes.synopsis: Petunia worries that an accidentally delivered monster truck won't work for her; Mayor Archibald's job is threatened when Tom Celeriac runs for mayor.
episodes.title: Monster Truck Flower Delivery / Vote for Archibald

episodes.synopsis: Bob, Larry and Mr. Lunt want to be cops after watching the show "Officer Stache"; Bob promises to take care of Ichabeezer when he gets the sniccups.
episodes.title: Ready for Action /  Sickabeezer

episodes.synopsis: Petunia's flytrap grows out of control after deciding she should be featured in "Plant Snob Monthly"; LarryBoy and Junior Jetpack work to stop Motato.
episodes.title: Plant-demonium /  DUO Day

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Archibald asks Larry to teach him to ride a bike so he can join the bike-a-thon; Larry's tag game obsession forces everyone to stay indoors.
episodes.title: Mayoral Bike Lessons / It

episodes.synopsis: Laura Carrot becomes friends with the new girl, Callie Flower; Laura takes whining too far after Ichaneezer tells her it's how to get what she wants.
episodes.title: Callie Flower / World of Whiners

episodes.synopsis: Tina Celerina becomes overwhelmed when she organizes two birthday parties at the same time; Junior Asparagus meets the new kid in school, Gary Garlic.
episodes.title: Two Birthdays / Playground Tales

episodes.synopsis: Motato sneaks into Captain Mike's space camp disguised as a kid so he can go to space; Junior Jetpack becomes obsessed with being famous.
episodes.title: Spacetato / Starved for Attention

episodes.synopsis: Motato disguises himself in order to steal Bob's weather measuring machine; Larry and Ichabeezer trade places to experience each other's lives.
episodes.title: The Imposters / Place Trading

episodes.synopsis: Bob and Larry try not to panic when they get locked out of the house; Ichabeezer spoils the fun when he joins Junior and Laura Carrot's baseball team.
episodes.title: Locked Out / Coach Ichabeezer

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Pea forces the gang to face their fears, only to discover a fear of his own. Ichabeezer moves away and discovers how special his home is.
episodes.title: Scaredy Cat Bootcamp / Ichabeezer Moves Out

episodes.synopsis: After Mr. Lunt loses Junior's jetpack, he makes things worse by lying. Bob worries that Larry has found a new best friend.
episodes.title: The Missing Jetpack / Bacon vs. Tomato

episodes.synopsis: Larry gets some extremely evil competition at his new job. Mr. Pea and Mr. Asparagus go too far when trying to find the best pets for their sons.
episodes.title: Motato Gets a Job / Pet Day

episodes.synopsis: When Madame Blueberry wins tickets to a Jenna Chive concert, she becomes very popular. A class project to build a clubhouse leads to conflict.
episodes.title: Blueberry's Tickets / A Team Divided

episodes.synopsis: Laura's new business turns out to be more difficult than she expected. When Motato kidnaps Granny, Laura proves heart is more important than height.
episodes.title: Laura's Animal Babysitting Service / Rise of Night Pony

episodes.synopsis: Motato lets a greedy monster loose that puts everything in town at risk. When Laura's painting gets more attention than Bob's, feelings are hurt.
episodes.title: Takesaurus / The Painting

episodes.synopsis: With his granddaughter visiting, Ichabeezer only has a day to learn how to be a good grandpa. A spiny friend gets between Motato and an evil plan.
episodes.title: Ichabeezer's Granddaughter / Gone Lobster

episodes.synopsis: Bob changes his look to appear smarter but things don't go exactly as planned. When Larry volunteers to help direct traffic, power goes to his head.
episodes.title: Bob Gets Glasses / Crossing Guard

episodes.synopsis: Larry misreads a Bible verse and creates a very sticky situation. When the newest action figure hits the store, everyone must learn to share.
episodes.title: Glued at the Hip / The Action Figure

episodes.synopsis: Larry discovers the value of a faithful friend when he loses his tooth. Larry's laziness leads to a sinking feeling for both him and Bob.
episodes.title: The Lost Tooth / The Companion Ship

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy steals LarryBoy's identity and gives them both a lesson in humility. Larry uses his imagination to conduct his own Western adventure.
episodes.title: Jimmy Boy / The Larry Express

episodes.synopsis: Larry becomes mayor for a day and makes the most of it. The gang has to find a way to tell Petunia she isn't funny without hurting her feelings.
episodes.title: Larry Lives It Up! / Petunia Is Not Funny

episodes.synopsis: LarryBoy learns that jumping to conclusions never pays off. Madame Blueberry discovers that giving her all leads to more success and even more fun.
episodes.title: The Big Secret / The Secret Soccer Skills
